title: Will my domain be extended when transferring to ZAP?
content: Yes. When you transfer a domain to us, it will be renewed for one year starting from the transfer date.

title: Are domains included in the Webspace XtraXtra Large plan?
content: No. Domains are not part of the package and must be purchased separately.

title: How can I protect my WHOIS contact details?
content: You can manage and add alternative contact handles via the 'Handle Management' section in our web interface.

title: Is there a limit to the number of subdomains I can create?
content: No. There is no restriction from our side on how many subdomains you can set up.

title: How can I connect my domain to my Minecraft server?
content: If your domain is registered with us, you can link it to your Minecraft server using our EasyDNS module. Simply choose your server as the target.

title: Which nameservers should I use for an external domain?
content: If you manage your domain externally, you should continue to use the nameservers provided by your external host.

title: Is HTTP or frame forwarding supported for domains?
content: No. These types of redirects are not supported for domains. You would need a VPS, Root Server, or Dedicated Server to configure such forwarding.

title: Do webspace packages include DynDNS?
content: No. Our webspace is managed with Plesk, which does not support DynDNS.

title: Why does my domain only have 360 days instead of 365?
content: We calculate our annual billing cycle based on the German bank year, which consists of 360 days.

title: Are email addresses included with my domain?
content: No. Ordering a domain does not include email services. You need webspace or a server to set up email accounts.
